pull.title: get miniupnpc from ssl, this reverts commit 21b8a14d37c19ce292d5529597e0d52338db48a9
pull.body: the tuxfamily mirror is back up, revert back to an SSL source

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#30301](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30301) (depends: bump miniupnpc to 2.2.8 by theuni)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

Please refer to the commit that this is reverting in the commit message. Git can do it all for you, if you type:

```
git revert 21b8a14d37c19ce292d5529597e0d52338db48a9

rename.to: get miniupnpc from ssl, this reverts commit 21b8a14d37c19ce292d5529597e0d52338db48a9

events.body: thanks for the heads up @maflcko! until the changes and bump in version are pushed, its important to pull depends from ssl sources.
@justinvforvendetta you've changed the PR title here, but not the commit message. Running the command that @maflcko gave on master will generate a specific revert commit with the expected title.

events.message:
get miniupnpc from ssl, this reverts commit 21b8a14d37c19ce292d5529597e0d52338db48a9

tuxfamily mirror is back up, revert back to SSL source

events.body:
> fixed it. i misinterpreted, thanks

Thanks, but you've still misinterpreted. You should literally type:
```bash
git revert 21b8a14d37c19ce292d5529597e0d52338db48a9
```
which will give a commit like this:
```patch
commit 3e36c5c07a32b24a10a4ded17ccd129717fb0c82 (HEAD -> master)
Author: fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com>
Date:   Wed Aug 7 20:18:15 2024 +0100

    Revert "depends: Fetch miniupnpc sources from an alternative website"
    
    This reverts commit 21b8a14d37c19ce292d5529597e0d52338db48a9.

diff --git a/depends/packages/miniupnpc.mk b/depends/packages/miniupnpc.mk
index 91d71a71b6..f9e114b495 100644
--- a/depends/packages/miniupnpc.mk
+++ b/depends/packages/miniupnpc.mk
@@ -1,6 +1,6 @@
 package=miniupnpc
 $(package)_version=2.2.7
-$(package)_download_path=http://miniupnp.free.fr/files/
+$(package)_download_path=https://miniupnp.tuxfamily.org/files/
 $(package)_file_name=$(package)-$($(package)_version).tar.gz
 $(package)_sha256_hash=b0c3a27056840fd0ec9328a5a9bac3dc5e0ec6d2e8733349cf577b0aa1e70ac1
 $(package)_patches=dont_leak_info.patch cmake_get_src_addr.patch fix_windows_snprintf.patch
```
